-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stoeacisd3gg1.dfs.core.windows.net/stage2p/contoso_sis/studentsectionmark_pseudo/school_year=2021/part-00000-cbfae834-e953-4401-8441-6d70f0501009.c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
